description.lang: The product is intended to resemble a normal wall switch and is primarily used to control, via RF, lights. It is battery operated and capable of acting as the primary controller in a system. It supports on/off and dim up/down control of a single group.1 GANG BATTERY CONTROLLERFully portable, can be used from any location in the systemCan be selected as the system's Primary ControllerRF Range up to 75m (open field)Can control up to 64 devices in totalPre programmed with ALL OFF function and HOLIDAY MODE functionLow battery indicatorLong battery life of tp to 2 years (under normal operating conditions)STANDARD CARTON QUANTITY: 1Supplied with wall and back box mounting brackets, batteries and all required fixings.Operating Frequency 865.2 MHzSelect the appropriate 1 Gang Dimmer Fascia for your Battery Controller Module.
